projectGridLines.title: MPROVISING EXISTING MACHINES AND WORKFLOW
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The students shall be tasked to find scope of improvement that can be made on current hardware and machines/workflow through use of technologies in IoT and blockchain domain.  Finally they have to craft training program that can be used to train the current staff to implement the changes.

Skill sets:  -

Traits expectation:  Programming, Research

Expected learning: Cutting Edge technologies in the domain of IoT and Blackchain, Detailed insight about the manufacturing of corrugated box manufacturing and cosmetic products.

Specific courses required for project execution:  Internet of Things, Blockchain, Electrical Machines.
